_sText:
Fixes from Version 1 (http://www.fpsbanana.com/maps/68691):
Fixed the extreme lag problem
Took out several props to help remove lag
add 3d skybox

Other than that, i'm going to use the same description as I did with version 1.

This is a remake of my original Western map (http://www.fpsbanana.com/maps/30506). I made this one much better with more detail, a dust sort of theme, more buildings, a more detailed inside bar, better stairs, much better designed windows with glass (original didn't have glass), better scaled windows and doors, much better ladders, buy zones, many more spawn points (i went a little overboard on the spawn points), much better lighting, more props places strategically in the map, and much more.

Also in this map I didn't put in the bridges that connect the roof tops since I found that to be really annoying in the original map.

The buildings are based off a bar (not a real one) so I used tables, stools and wine shelves to make it look realistic. I also added a second floor to all of the buildings to make gameplay a little more exciting.

And overall, this map would also work Excellent for a deathmatch server, it is large enough to provide great gameplay but small enough that it won't be a challenge to find people. 

try it out and assess, tell me what u think.
